tests.name: 2.1 OP2MNEM
tests.setup: (git clone https://github.com/PCS3616/MVN.git || true) && sudo -H pip3 install pytest && curl -LO $(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/PCS3616/mvn-rs/releases/latest | grep browser_download_url | grep mvn-cli | cut -d '"' -f 4) && chmod +x mvn-cli
